circumstances: After takeoff from Kenai Airport, while climbing to an altitude of 2,000 feet, the engine n°1 caught fire and exploded. The crew declared an emergency and elected to return to Kenai when a part of the left wing detached. Out of control, the airplane crashed in a pasture and was destroyed by impact forces and a post crash fire. All three occupants were killed.
probable_cause:
Engine fire and explosion in flight due to engine structure: cylinder assembly material failure. The following contributing factors were reported: 
- Overload failure, 
- Fire in engine and wing,
- Separation in flight, 
- Failure of cylinder n°2 in engine n°1.
